item.title: NHL Predictions - February 16, 2020
item.description: These predictions are created using an ELO Model. More information on my methodology is coming in a future post. Table 1: NHL Predictions - February 15, 2020 Game Probability Away Team Wins Probability Home Team Wins Toronto Maple Leafs @ Buffalo Sabres 55.41% 44.59% Edmonton Oilers @ Carolina Hurricanes 43.55% 56.
